00078         HASH_ITER_END    = 2,         
00079         HASH_ITER_INLINE = 4,

00082 typedef ssize_t  (*hash_iterator)(hash_t *hash, void *arg);

00084 #define hash_ptr_null     (hash_key_t)-1
00085 #define hash_ptr_end      (hash_key_t)-2 
00086 #define hash_ptr_inline   (hash_key_t)-3
00087 
00088 #define hash_null         {hash_ptr_null,    {0, NULL}}            ///< Mark null item here
00089 #define hash_inline(hash) {hash_ptr_inline,  DATA_PTR_HASHT(hash)} ///< Mark inline hash here
00090 #define hash_next(hash)   {hash_ptr_end,     {0, (void *)hash}} ///< Mark next hash  // TODO deprecate
00091 #define hash_end          hash_next(NULL)    ///< Mark hash end
00092 #define HK(value)         HASH_KEY_##value   ///< Shortcut for registed hash keys. Also used in key registration process.

00168 #define hash_assign_hash_inline(_dst, _hash) {  \
00169         (_dst)->key = hash_ptr_inline;   \
00170         (_dst)->data.type = TYPE_HASHT;  \
00171         (_dst)->data.ptr = _hash;        \

00173 #define hash_assign_hash_null(_dst) {  \
00174         (_dst)->key = hash_ptr_null;   \
00175         (_dst)->data.type = TYPE_VOIDT;\
00176         (_dst)->data.ptr = NULL;       \
00177 }
